name: Nilfur's Boast
flavorText: The Horadrim Nilfur was so accurate in her spellcasting that she could call meteors to land at her feet.
flavorTextHtml: The Horadrim Nilfur was so accurate in her spellcasting that she could call meteors to land at her feet.

primary.textHtml: +[91 - 100] Resistance to All Elements

secondary.textHtml: Increase the damage of Meteor by 600%. When your Meteor hits 3 or fewer enemies, the damage is increased by 675%. (Wizard Only) [675 - 900]%
secondary.text: Increase the damage of Meteor by 600%. When your Meteor hits 3 or fewer enemies, the damage is increased by 675%. (Wizard Only) [675 - 900]%
